name: audit-service
description: Event-driven audit logging consumer for xshopai platform

scripts.start: dapr run --app-id audit-service --app-port 1012 --dapr-http-port 3500 --dapr-grpc-port 50001 --log-level warn --config ./.dapr/config.yaml --resources-path ./.dapr/components -- node dist/server.js
scripts.dev: dapr run --app-id audit-service --app-port 1012 --dapr-http-port 3500 --dapr-grpc-port 50001 --log-level warn --config ./.dapr/config.yaml --resources-path ./.dapr/components -- npx tsx watch src/server.ts
scripts.debug: dapr run --app-id audit-service --app-port 1012 --dapr-http-port 3500 --dapr-grpc-port 50001 --log-level warn --config ./.dapr/config.yaml --resources-path ./.dapr/components -- npx tsx --inspect=9229 src/server.ts

author: xshopai Team
